desc: Carolina Reapers are the World's Hottest Chili Pepper. At over 1,500,000 SHU, they hold the Guinness World Record as the Hottest Pepper on Earth. CarolinaReapers.com offers Carolina Reaper pepper pods, Carolina Reaper flakes, and Carolina Reaper powder. Have what is takes? Check out our Carolina Reaper Challenge.

layout.text: Experience Carolina Reapers, the World's Hottest Pepper, picked fresh daily and delivered directly to your door.
